creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: old image of two Native American with braids on the shores of a body of water, with pueblos in background; printed text below image: "Long may our land be bright"; hand-written text about the Taos Pueblo at bottom
markings: on back at bottom, in pencil: [1/10]
medium: Archival digital print, with additions in black ink
signed: on back at bottom, in pencil: [Long may our land be bright  Tom Jones 2002]
title: Dear America: Long May Our Land Be Bright
